identity.mission: Create a clinical, data-first interface that feels like a high-end scientific instrument, not a generic SaaS dashboard.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Swiss Medical Journal' aesthetics with 'Agricultural Field Data'.
Content is King: Data legibility is the primary design constraint.
Zoom In: Use macro textures of plants to ground the data in reality.
Negative Space: High density for data, high breathing room for containers.

usage.data: font-mono (JetBrains Mono), text-xs or text-sm, tracking-wide

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-sm px-6 py-2 font-medium text-sm transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-sm px-6 py-2 font-medium text-sm transition-all

inputs.default: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-sm h-10 text-sm font-secondary placeholder:text-slate-400

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on sidebars or dark panels.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Minimalist. shadow-sm or shadow-md only. No large diffuse shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: Crisp 1px borders are preferred over shadows for separation.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers or floating action bars. backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-b border-slate-200/50.

hero_bg.description: Aerial view of organized crop rows. Use as a subtle background texture or hero image with overlay.

login_side.description: Scientist with microscope. Use for Login/Signup side panel to establish clinical trust.

texture_leaf.description: Macro leaf texture. Use for 'Analysis' cards or empty states.

healthy_crop.description: Green wheat close up. Use for 'Healthy' status indicators or success states.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a scientific instrument. Precision is key. Do not use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Stick to rounded-sm or rounded-md. Use the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts. Style them minimally. Remove grid lines if possible, or make them very subtle (stroke-slate-100). Use the brand palette for data series.
instructions_to_main_agent.forms: This is a data-heavy app. Forms should be dense but legible. Use 'grid-cols-2' for input fields to save vertical space. Group related fields (Environmental vs Visual) into fieldsets with clear legends.
instructions_to_main_agent.tables: Use Shadcn Table. Add 'whitespace-nowrap' to cells. Use a monospaced font for numerical data columns.
instructions_to_main_agent.navigation: Sidebar navigation is preferred for this type of app. Use a dark sidebar (bg-slate-900) to contrast with the light data panels.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise.
Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'IBM Plex Sans'.
Do not center text in cards unless it is a stat summary.
Always add hover states to interactive elements.
Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards.
